name: ECE 171L
title: Analog Electronics Laboratory
description: Laboratory sequence illustrating topics covered in course 171. One two-hour laboratory session per week.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECE 101 and  ECE 101L; previous or concurrent enrollment in ECE 171 is required.

class_notes: Concurrent enrollment in ECE 171 is required. Enroll in lab and associated secondary lab.
